ab7faae5d7b250ea8606486575f8f79c (16:48): There are practical reasons to include artificial languages in Unicode - people want to use normal software (text editors, copy-and-paste, TTF fonts, HTML, etc) to manipulate text in those languages, and that software is all designed around being able to represent any text using Unicode
